availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alderson T. Keene (Major in 1st Ky Cavalry)

body.p: Born in Kentucky in October 1840. Married to Sallie C. Keen in 1867. Children included Bettie C., Mattie H., and Harry W. Served as Major in Union 1st Kentucky Cavalry Regiment.

bibl.p: Alderson T Keene, ; from "Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky," Fold3.com; citing military unit First Cavalry, J-L, NARA microfilm publication M397, roll 7, National Archives and Records Administration, Washington, D.C.; Alderson T Keen, Magisterial District 1, North Somerset Precinct Somerset city Ward 1-3, Pulaski, Kentucky, United States; citing enumeration district (ED) 99, sheet 5B, family 100, NARA microfilm publication T623 (Washington, D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, 1972.); FHL microfilm 1,240,549.
